mapper.select:
SELECT A.*, (select code.code_name from code where code.code='product_delivery_type' and code.code_value =A.giveaway_delivery_type) as giveaway_delivery_type_name, (select Z.product_made_company_name from product_made_company Z where Z.product_made_company_cd=A.giveaway_made_company_cd) as giveaway_made_company_name, (select code.code_name from code where code.code='product_sale_yn' and code.code_value =A.giveaway_sale_yn) as giveaway_sale_yn_name, (select Z.file_link from product_file Z where Z.key_id = A.giveaway_cd and Z.file_order = 1) as file_1, (select Z.file_link from product_file Z where Z.key_id = A.giveaway_cd and Z.file_order = 2) as file_2, (select Z.file_link from product_file Z where Z.key_id = A.giveaway_cd and Z.file_order = 3) as file_3, (select Z.file_link from product_file Z where Z.key_id = A.giveaway_cd and Z.file_order = 4) as file_4, (select Z.file_link from product_file Z where Z.key_id = A.giveaway_cd and Z.file_order = 5) as file_5, ifnull((((select sum(Z.giveaway_payment_epoint) from giveaway_play_history Z where Z.giveaway_cd = A.giveaway_cd) / A.giveaway_play_winner_point) * 100) , 0) as parti_rate, ifnull((select sum(Z.giveaway_payment_epoint) from giveaway_play_history Z where Z.giveaway_cd = A.giveaway_cd) , 0) sum_play_point, (select ZZ.giveaway_winner_user_id from giveaway_winner ZZ where ZZ.giveaway_cd=A.giveaway_cd) giveaway_winner_user_id, (select ZZ.giveaway_winner_user_id from giveaway_winner ZZ where ZZ.giveaway_cd=A.giveaway_cd) giveaway_winner_user_id, CONCAT( left( SUBSTRING_INDEX( (select (select UU.email from user UU where UU.usr_id =ZZ.giveaway_winner_user_id) from giveaway_winner ZZ where ZZ.giveaway_cd=A.giveaway_cd),'@', 1) ,length( SUBSTRING_INDEX( (select (select UU.email from user UU where UU.usr_id =ZZ.giveaway_winner_user_id) from giveaway_winner ZZ where ZZ.giveaway_cd=A.giveaway_cd),'@', 1))-1), '***','@', SUBSTRING_INDEX((select (select UU.email from user UU where UU.usr_id =ZZ.giveaway_winner_user_id) from giveaway_winner ZZ where ZZ.giveaway_cd=A.giveaway_cd),'@', -1)) email, ifnull((select count(1) from giveaway_play_history Z where Z.giveaway_cd = A.giveaway_cd) , 0) player_count FROM giveaway A where 1=1
AND A.giveaway_id= #{giveaway_id} AND A.giveaway_cd= #{giveaway_cd}

select A.*, ifnull((((select sum(Z.giveaway_payment_epoint) from giveaway_play_history Z where Z.giveaway_cd = A.giveaway_cd) / A.giveaway_play_winner_point) * 100) , 0) as parti_rate, ifnull((select sum(Z.giveaway_payment_epoint) from giveaway_play_history Z where Z.giveaway_cd = A.giveaway_cd) , 0) sum_play_point, ifnull((select count(1) from giveaway_play_history Z where Z.giveaway_cd = A.giveaway_cd) , 0) player_count, (select ZZ.giveaway_winner_user_id from giveaway_winner ZZ where ZZ.giveaway_cd=A.giveaway_cd) giveaway_winner_user_id, CONCAT( left( SUBSTRING_INDEX( (select (select UU.email from user UU where UU.usr_id =ZZ.giveaway_winner_user_id) from giveaway_winner ZZ where ZZ.giveaway_cd=A.giveaway_cd),'@', 1) ,length( SUBSTRING_INDEX( (select (select UU.email from user UU where UU.usr_id =ZZ.giveaway_winner_user_id) from giveaway_winner ZZ where ZZ.giveaway_cd=A.giveaway_cd),'@', 1))-1), '***','@', SUBSTRING_INDEX((select (select UU.email from user UU where UU.usr_id =ZZ.giveaway_winner_user_id) from giveaway_winner ZZ where ZZ.giveaway_cd=A.giveaway_cd),'@', -1)) email, (select code.code_name from code where code.code='product_delivery_type' and code.code_value =A.giveaway_delivery_type) as giveaway_delivery_type_name, (select Z.product_made_company_name from product_made_company Z where Z.product_made_company_cd=A.giveaway_made_company_cd) as giveaway_made_company_name, (select code.code_name from code where code.code='product_sale_yn' and code.code_value =A.giveaway_sale_yn) as giveaway_sale_yn_name, (select Z.file_link from product_file Z where Z.key_id = A.giveaway_cd and Z.file_order = 1) as file_1, (select Z.file_link from product_file Z where Z.key_id = A.giveaway_cd and Z.file_order = 2) as file_2, (select Z.file_link from product_file Z where Z.key_id = A.giveaway_cd and Z.file_order = 3) as file_3, (select Z.file_link from product_file Z where Z.key_id = A.giveaway_cd and Z.file_order = 4) as file_4, (select Z.file_link from product_file Z where Z.key_id = A.giveaway_cd and Z.file_order = 5) as file_5 FROM giveaway A where 1=1
AND A.giveaway_id= #{giveway_id} AND A.giveaway_cd= #{giveaway_cd} AND A.giveaway_use_yn= #{giveaway_use_yn} AND A.giveaway_sale_yn= #{giveaway_sale_yn} AND A.giveaway_name like CONCAT('%',#{giveaway_name},'%') and ifnull((((select sum(Z.giveaway_payment_epoint) from giveaway_play_history Z where Z.giveaway_cd = A.giveaway_cd) / A.giveaway_play_winner_point) * 100) , 0) < 100 and ifnull((((select sum(Z.giveaway_payment_epoint) from giveaway_play_history Z where Z.giveaway_cd = A.giveaway_cd) / A.giveaway_play_winner_point) * 100) , 0) >= 100 order by ${orderByKey} ${orderByValue} order by giveaway_id DESC LIMIT ${rowStart-1}, ${staticRowEnd}
mapper.insert: insert into giveaway( giveaway_cd, giveaway_market_cd, giveaway_use_yn, giveaway_sale_yn, giveaway_ct, giveaway_new_class, giveaway_md_class, giveaway_name, giveaway_name_en, giveaway_seo_keywords, giveaway_seo_alt, giveaway_payment_type, giveaway_delivery_type_code, giveaway_memo, giveaway_point_class, giveaway_point_rate_cash, giveaway_members_limit, giveaway_view_locale_cd, giveaway_play_winner_point ) VALUES ( #{giveaway_cd}, #{giveaway_market_cd}, #{giveaway_use_yn}, #{giveaway_sale_yn}, #{giveaway_ct}, #{giveaway_new_class}, #{giveaway_adult_yn}, #{giveaway_option_yn}, #{giveaway_option_class}, #{giveaway_option_view_type}, #{giveaway_option_set_name}, #{giveaway_option_input}, #{giveaway_option_style}, #{giveaway_option_button_img}, #{giveaway_option_color}, #{giveaway_option_required}, #{giveaway_sold_out_memo}, #{giveaway_add_option}, #{giveaway_add_option_name}, #{giveaway_add_option_required}, mapper.select: select IFNULL(sum(A.giveaway_payment_epoint),0) from giveaway_play_history A where 1=1 AND A.giveaway_cd= #{giveaway_cd}
select IFNULL(giveaway_play_user_id,0) from giveaway_play_history where giveaway_play_status !='W' and giveaway_cd=#{giveaway_cd} order by rand() limit 1
mapper.update: update giveaway_play_history set giveaway_play_status = 'W' where giveaway_play_id=#{giveaway_play_id} and giveaway_cd=#{giveaway_cd}
mapper.insert:
insert into giveaway_winner( giveaway_id, giveaway_cd, giveaway_play_id, giveaway_winner_user_id )values( #{giveaway_id}, #{giveaway_cd}, #{giveaway_play_id}, #{giveaway_winner_user_id}
)
